UniprotID	P40938-2
Accession	P40938;C9JU95;O15252;Q5W0E8
EntryName	RFC3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Replication factor C subunit 3 (Activator 1 38 kDa subunit) (A1 38 kDa subunit) (Activator 1 subunit 3) (Replication factor C 38 kDa subunit) (RF-C 38 kDa subunit) (RFC38)
GeneName	RFC3
Length	305
Function	Subunit of the replication factor C (RFC) complex which acts during elongation of primed DNA templates by DNA polymerases delta and epsilon, and is necessary for ATP-dependent loading of proliferating cell nuclear antigen (PCNA) onto primed DNA.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
